dependsOn.activity: Get LastLoad Date from Json in Adls
Get LatestLoad Date from Azure SQL

sqlReaderQuery.value: select * from dbo.factbookings where booking_date > '@{activity('Get LastLoad Date from Json in Adls').output.firstRow.lastload}' AND booking_date < '@{activity('Get LatestLoad Date from Azure SQL').output.firstRow.LatestLoad}'

activities.name: Get LastLoad Date from Json in Adls
Get LatestLoad Date from Azure SQL

sqlReaderQuery.value: select max(booking_date) as LatestLoad from dbo.FactBookings

activities.name: Update LatestLoad date and copy to Adls JSON
Copy data from onprem Fileserver to ADLS

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select s.name as schemaName,
t.name as tableName
from sys.tables t
inner join sys.schemas s on s.schema_id = t.schema_id
where s.name = 'SalesLT'
